thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1782
thread.title: Cindy

author: Cindy
title: Cindy
text: Overall I like using Flight Hub to book my flights. It's a good way to see many different flights and choose the best one for you. What annoys me though is the seat selection portion. If you select a seat (actually, if you select a seat preference - aisle, window, etc), you are charged 10$ per selection. The most ridiculous part, it's not guaranteed. So, fair warning, just leave it blank, and then select your seats (for free) when you check in.
